name: AuditApp_Apps_ActivityForUser
query:
SELECT  
    `Apps`.`Name`,
    aps.`StartDateTime`,
    aps.`EndDateTime`,
    aps_apr.`Message`
FROM AppSessions AS aps
INNER JOIN Sessions AS ses ON aps.SessionID = ses.ID
INNER JOIN Apps ON aps.AppID = apps.ID
LEFT  JOIN AppResults AS aps_apr ON aps.AppResultID = aps_apr.ID
WHERE ses.UserID = $UserID
ORDER BY aps.`StartDateTime` DESC
